column5: My place is great for couples and small family. We also can provide play pin for your infant to sleep in. We have additional 2 rooms to accommodate all your family members. Private rooms with private bathroom.  Tv is in common area. Sheets, towels and toiletries will be provided. Gated community. We are only 7 minute drive from SeaWorld and 20 mins from Six Flags Fiesta Texas. We are right off highway 1604,so it's easy to commute. Reach out to me if you have any additional questions or requests.
column8: A friendly home near Sea World
